backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with customer, service, AMC contract, AMC service entry, reminder, and revenue-related types, along with storage maps and access control state initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking features to source files, components, and tests with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend components, hooks, and pages for reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment checklist outlining AMC tab visibility, currency formatting checks, authentication flow validation, and build steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining theme variables, light/dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, data loading validation, and conditional rendering of the Dashboard or login prompt.
frontend/src/components/AddAMCContractDi: Dialog for creating a new AMC contract, handling customer selection, validation, and submission via addAMC mutation.
frontend/src/components/AddAMCServiceEnt: Dialog to add an AMC service entry with date, notes, optional parts and price reduction, submitting through addAMCServiceEntry.
frontend/src/components/AddCustomerDialo: Dialog for adding a new customer with optional AMC details, validating fields and submitting through addCustomer.
frontend/src/components/AddReminderDialo: Dialog to schedule a reminder for a customer, selecting customer, date, and description before submitting via addReminder.
frontend/src/components/AddServiceEntryD: Dialog for adding a regular service entry with service type, payment info, notes, and submission through addServiceEntry.
frontend/src/components/AMCBadge.tsx: Displays a styled badge representing an AMC contract type using metadata from utility functions.
frontend/src/components/AMCTab.tsx: Renders a table of all AMC contracts with add-contract dialog support, using customer data and currency/date formatting.
frontend/src/components/CustomerDetailDi: Customer detail view with editing, service history, AMC management, and dialogs to add service or AMC service entries.
frontend/src/components/CustomerList.tsx: Renders a sortable, selectable customer table with admin multi-delete support and per-row view/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/CustomersTab.tsx: Manages fetching, filtering, searching, importing, and deleting customers, displaying results via CustomerList and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Displays dashboard metric cards for customers, services, and reminders using query data with loading states.
frontend/src/components/EditServiceEntry: Provides a form dialog to edit a service entry, handling validation and submitting updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing ©2025 and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with branding, theme toggle, and authenticated user menu with logout.
frontend/src/components/ImportPreviewMod: Shows a preview of parsed customer import data, highlighting valid/invalid rows and confirming import.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Displays a login landing page and triggers Internet Identity login with status handling and toast messages.
frontend/src/components/MarkServiceDoneD: Dialog for marking a service as completed and auto‑calculating the next reminder date based on customer interval.
frontend/src/components/RemindersTab.tsx: Shows today, upcoming, or all reminders with actions like WhatsApp sending, marking done, and customer details.
frontend/src/components/RevenueAnalytics: Displays revenue analytics by month, quarter, year, AMC, customers, and payment methods with selectable filters.
frontend/src/components/ServicesTab.tsx: Lists service entries with filters, payment updates, creation/editing dialogs, and deletion confirmation.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button to toggle between light and dark themes using next‑themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for admin checks and CRUD operations on customers, services, reminders, and revenue data via an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind CSS base styles, custom CSS variables, and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/src/lib/amc.ts: Maps AMC types and contract statuses to display labels and style information.
frontend/src/lib/fyQuarter.ts: Defines fiscal year quarters and utilities to get the current quarter and its label.
frontend/src/lib/phoneNormalization.ts: Normalizes Indian phone numbers to E.164 format and extracts WhatsApp-compatible digit-only numbers.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides utility functions for merging class names, formatting dates, and formatting INR currency.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard with tab navigation for overview, customers, services, reminders, revenue, and AMC.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining content paths, theme extensions, color variables, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing schema version, features, and deployment-related project state.
